thread.title: Mark Cuban Sees Unequal Struggle for Working People
thread.title_full: Mark Cuban Sees Unequal Struggle for Working People - WSJ

author: Danny Yadron
title: Mark Cuban Sees Unequal Struggle for Working People
text:
LAGUNA BEACH, Calif.—Mark Cuban delivered a less-than-sunny take on economic mobility to a high-tech audience here Tuesday.
The serial entrepreneur, reality TV star and Dallas Mavericks owner used colorful language when he lamented that if a working family is “busting ass at their job, saving money like they should, they’re f—.”
Mr. Cuban, a host of ABC’s “Shark Tank” startup show, offered an animated critique of the modern...
